forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog and a slight chance of rain showers. Cloudy. Low around 60, with temperatures rising to around 62 overnight. North northwest wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Patchy Fog then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog and a slight chance of rain showers before 11am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 73. North northwest wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Patchy Fog
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then patchy fog. Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. Northwest wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog before 9am. Sunny, with a high near 78. West wind around 3 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
